mapper.select: SELECT count(id) as id, sum(customer_credit_rating) as customer_credit_rating, sum(customer_balance_amt) as customer_balance_amt, sum(customer_freeze_balance) as customer_freeze_balance, sum(customer_owe_amt) as customer_owe_amt, sum(customer_penalty_amt) as customer_penalty_amt FROM tenant_customer ${ew.customSqlSegment}
